author: NukDokPlex
description: Simply forces nickname for user by command. When users are trying to change their nickname, it simply overwrite it to set before.
short: Simply forces nickname for user by command
name: Nickname Forcer
install_msg:
Installed successfuly!
To set Riot API key use command ``[p]set api leagueoflegends api_key,[YOUR_API_KEY]``.
Author's website: https://nukdotcom.ru/
